fields.name: reminder_email
fields.description: Reminder email that is sent to LRP and Conference Host
fields.subject: Ashoka Globalizer: Reminder to fill out the team survey
fields.content:
Dear Conference Host, 

We hope this e-mail finds you well!

This is just a friendly reminder to please submit the survey for your last call with the Globalizer advisory team.  If you already have, thanks so much!
{{data}}
  
We look at it regularly to get a sense of how your team is doing and really value your comments/feedback!  

Thanks and best regards,
Ashoka Globalizer Team

----------------------------------- 
This message is automatically generated. If you have already filled out the survey for the call please disregard this message.  If the call didn´t happen, please let us know so we can track that too!!

fields.name: welcome_email
fields.subject: Welcome
fields.content:
Hi!

Thanks for taking over the role of the "Conference Host" for your team!
The Conference Host's role is to fill out a short team survey directly after each team call. It only takes 1 minute, but it's important to do it after every call. You can find the survey here: 
{{data}}

The Globalizer team manages many teams at the same time. Without your help, it would be impossible to keep a good overview. 

Best Regards,
Ashoka Globalizer Team

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please note: This is an automated email. Kindly contact the Ashoka Globalizer Team if you have any questions.

fields.name: consultant_request
fields.subject: Consultant Request from Team {{team}}
fields.content:
Dear LRP,

This is to inform you that we have received a request from the consultant of Team {{team}} .
We therefore kindly ask you to take a look at it.

Here it is,
{{request}}



Best regards,
Ashoka Globalizer Team

--- 
This message is automatically generated. If you have any complaints regarding it please contact Ashoka Team.
---
